alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fairfield, Lancaster, northwestern Chesterfield and northern Kershaw Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Falls, or 12 miles southwest of Lancaster, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Springdale, Pageland, Kershaw, Elgin, Heath Springs, Westville, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Cassatt, Liberty Hill, Mt Pisgah, Buford, Lake Wateree State Park, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Jefferson, North Central High School, Arrowood Estates, Bell Town Fire Station, and Mitford. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 39 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
